message.content:
I need to identify the total income (revenue) from ordinary activities in the income statement and extract its value along with one component sub-item.

Looking at the income statement, I can see:
- "Total Revenue" with a value of 18062437.45
- Its main component appears to be "Main Business Revenue" with the same value of 18062437.45

The total income from ordinary activities is represented by "Total Revenue" which equals 18062437.45.

The single component sub-item is "Main Business Revenue" which also equals 18062437.45.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '18062437.45', 'sub_items': {'sub_item value': '18062437.45'}}}
```
